title: IC2修改
author: 高级太阳能
txt_content:
图片上传就没反应过！
反应堆冷却液注入器，一个红石块（青金石块）修一次，生存没可能。看完一次config文件夹，很多配方都是缩写简写，切割机、压缩机常用的都有，就是没找到这个机器？

 Condensator recharging
; RSH - 50% Redstone
minecraft:redstone @filler*10000 = ic2:rsh_condensator
; LZH - 5% Redstone
minecraft:redstone @filler*5000 = ic2:lzh_condensator
; LZH - 40% Lapis
minecraft:dye@4 @filler*40000 = ic2:lzh_condensator
（这个是合成台的）

;RSH-Condensator（红石冷凝模块）
"RRR|RVR|RSR" R:minecraft:redstone@* V:ic2:heat_vent S:ic2:heat_exchanger = ic2:rsh_condensator
;

 LZH-Condensator（青金石冷凝模块）
"RVR|CLC|RSR" R:minecraft:redstone@* V:ic2:reactor_heat_vent S:ic2:reactor_heat_exchanger C:ic2:rsh_condensator L:minecraft:lapis_block@* = ic2:lzh_condensator

RCI-RSH
（红石模块散热器）
"ECE|CMC|EBE" E:ic2:upgrade#ejector C:ic2:rsh_condensator M:ic2:resource#advanced_machine B:ic2:te#item_buffer_2 = ic2:te#rci_rsh
; 

RCI-LZH（青金石模块散热器）
"ECE|CMC|EBE" E:ic2:upgrade#ejector C:ic2:lzh_condensator M:ic2:resource#advanced_machine B:ic2:te#item_buffer_2 = ic2:te#rci_lzh


还是作者把这个机器用其它代码代替了？
